title: Jason of Star Command - All Episodes (iPod compatible)
description:
\"Jason Of Star Command\" was a segment of \"Tarzan And The Super 7.\" (Originally called \"The Batman/Tarzan Adventure Hour\" and later called \"Batman And The Super 7\") The story of the show is this: Hidden away on the same base as Space Academy, Jason and his various partners (Nicole, Parsafoot and Samantha) and his pocket- robot, Wiki work as agents for Star Command, a secret


All episodes from Season 1 and 2 are encoded from DVD in H.264 iPod compatible (480x368) and de-interlaced. They also play fine with XBMC. The quality is very good to watch on a regular TV so don\&#039;t think that these are bad quality just because they are encoded for iPod. The original quality of these episodes doesn\&#039;t really justify encoding with anything better anyways :) 


I haven\&#039;t seen this on here so I don\&#039;t know if anyone really wants this. If you do then please seed. I also have Space Academy and Ark II, so if this one is popular I will consider those.



Here is the list of episodes. 


Season One:
1. Attack of the Dragonship
2. Prisoner of Dragos
3. Escape from the Dragons
4. A Cry for Help
5. Wiki to the Rescue
6. Planet of the Lost
7. Marooned in Time
8. Attack of the Dragons
9. Peepo\&#039;s Last Chance
10. The Disappearing Man
11. The Haunted Planet
12. Escape from Kesh
13. Return of the Creature
14. Peepo on Trial
15. The Trojan Horse
16. The Victory of Star Command

Season Two:
17. Mission to the Stars
18. Frozen in Space
19. Web of the Star Witch
20. Beyond the Stars!
21. Secret of the Ancients
22. The Power of the Star Disk
23. Through the Stargate
24. Face to Face

26. Little Girl Lost
27. Mimi\&#039;s Secret

Documentary and Effects Demo Reel are also included.
